name: Blood and Volts
description:
Tower Defense meets Nuclear Throne. Conquer a small alien planet, playing as an indomitable invading robot. Protect your power generator to keep turrets running, and survive against the endless onslaught of natives for as long as you can. This planet should have remained unvisited.

Made for gm48 and Ludum Dare 46 gamejams, incorporating both themes: "Small World" and "Keep it Alive"

By @dev_dwarf, @nol_nad and @LewmothMusic.
